886    /**
887     * builds Payment with checking for non-null required values
888     * @return Payment
889     */
890    public Payment build() {
891        Objects.requireNonNull(id, Payment.class + ": id is missing");
892        Objects.requireNonNull(version, Payment.class + ": version is missing");
893        Objects.requireNonNull(createdAt, Payment.class + ": createdAt is missing");
894        Objects.requireNonNull(lastModifiedAt, Payment.class + ": lastModifiedAt is missing");
895        Objects.requireNonNull(amountPlanned, Payment.class + ": amountPlanned is missing");
896        Objects.requireNonNull(paymentMethodInfo, Payment.class + ": paymentMethodInfo is missing");
897        Objects.requireNonNull(paymentStatus, Payment.class + ": paymentStatus is missing");
898        Objects.requireNonNull(transactions, Payment.class + ": transactions is missing");
899        Objects.requireNonNull(interfaceInteractions, Payment.class + ": interfaceInteractions is missing");
900        return new PaymentImpl(id, version, createdAt, lastModifiedAt, lastModifiedBy, createdBy, customer, anonymousId,
901            externalId, interfaceId, amountPlanned, amountAuthorized, authorizedUntil, amountPaid, amountRefunded,
902            paymentMethodInfo, paymentStatus, transactions, interfaceInteractions, custom, key);
903    }
904
905    /**
906     * builds Payment without checking for non-null required values
907     * @return Payment
908     */
909    public Payment buildUnchecked() {
910        return new PaymentImpl(id, version, createdAt, lastModifiedAt, lastModifiedBy, createdBy, customer, anonymousId,
911            externalId, interfaceId, amountPlanned, amountAuthorized, authorizedUntil, amountPaid, amountRefunded,
912            paymentMethodInfo, paymentStatus, transactions, interfaceInteractions, custom, key);
913    }

915    /**
916     * factory method for an instance of PaymentBuilder
917     * @return builder
918     */
919    public static PaymentBuilder of() {
920        return new PaymentBuilder();
921    }
922
923    /**
924     * create builder for Payment instance
925     * @param template instance with prefilled values for the builder
926     * @return builder
927     */
928    public static PaymentBuilder of(final Payment template) {
929        PaymentBuilder builder = new PaymentBuilder();
930        builder.id = template.getId();
931        builder.version = template.getVersion();
932        builder.createdAt = template.getCreatedAt();
933        builder.lastModifiedAt = template.getLastModifiedAt();
934        builder.lastModifiedBy = template.getLastModifiedBy();
935        builder.createdBy = template.getCreatedBy();
936        builder.customer = template.getCustomer();
937        builder.anonymousId = template.getAnonymousId();
938        builder.externalId = template.getExternalId();
939        builder.interfaceId = template.getInterfaceId();
940        builder.amountPlanned = template.getAmountPlanned();
941        builder.amountAuthorized = template.getAmountAuthorized();
942        builder.authorizedUntil = template.getAuthorizedUntil();
943        builder.amountPaid = template.getAmountPaid();
944        builder.amountRefunded = template.getAmountRefunded();
945        builder.paymentMethodInfo = template.getPaymentMethodInfo();
946        builder.paymentStatus = template.getPaymentStatus();
947        builder.transactions = template.getTransactions();
948        builder.interfaceInteractions = template.getInterfaceInteractions();
949        builder.custom = template.getCustom();
950        builder.key = template.getKey();
951        return builder;
952    }
